<title>Nebraska | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Recorded on four-track cassette in his New Jersey bedroom, Nebraska has proved one of Springsteen's most enduring works, a raw, haunted acoustic record populated by lost souls searching not for salvation through music but simply a reason to believe." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/nebraska/" />

yoast_head_json.title: Nebraska | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Recorded on four-track cassette in his New Jersey bedroom, Nebraska has proved one of Springsteen's most enduring works, a raw, haunted acoustic record populated by lost souls searching not for salvation through music but simply a reason to believe.
